admin.noEventsDesc: Create your first event to start generating QR codes and collecting photos from guests.

createEvent.title: Create New Event
createEvent.desc: Fill in the details for your new CrowdSnap event.
createEvent.descriptionPlaceholder: A short welcome message for your guests. If left blank, a default message will be used.

eventDetail.guestQrDesc: Guests can scan this or use the link to upload photos directly from their phones.
eventDetail.shareLink: Share this link or QR code with your guests. No app required.

uploadGrid.noUploadsDesc: Guests haven't uploaded any photos or videos to this event yet.
uploadGrid.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete {name}?
uploadGrid.confirmDeleteAll1: Are you SURE you want to permanently delete all {count} uploads for this event?
uploadGrid.confirmDeleteAll2: SECOND WARNING: This will immediately erase all {count} photos and videos from the server. They cannot be recovered. Are you absolutely sure?
uploadGrid.confirmDeleteAll3: FINAL CONFIRMATION: Are you 100% positive you want to wipe everything for this event? Click OK to proceed.

guest.safelyShared: Your files have been safely shared.
guest.someSkipped: Some files were skipped because they are not valid images or videos.
guest.defaultDescription: Drop your photos and videos below to share them with the host. High quality formatting is preserved.

editEvent.title: Edit Event
editEvent.desc: Make changes to your event details here. Click save when you're done.
editEvent.customCoverIconDesc: Overrides the default camera icon on the guest view.

login.title: Admin Login
login.desc: Enter the master password to access the CrowdSnap dashboard

home.subtitle: A self-hosted, secure way to collect photos and videos from your guests. No cloud storage fees, no public links, zero privacy concerns.
home.feature1Desc: Files are saved directly to local storage and never touch public CDNs.
home.feature2Desc: Collect the original, uncompressed high-quality assets from mobile phones.
home.feature3Desc: Stream giant video files directly to disk without bloating server memory.
